subject: Television
Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: A group led by Magic Johnson agreed to buy the Dodgers for $2.15 billion, gambling that a new cable TV deal in 2013 will make the gigantic outlay worthwhile.
snippet: A group led by Magic Johnson agreed to buy the Dodgers for $2.15 billion, gambling that a new cable TV deal in 2013 will make the gigantic outlay worthwhile.
